thread.title: Heidi Montag heads to pool in bikini in her London hotel | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Heidi Montag heads to pool in bikini in her London hotel | Daily Mail Online

author: Dan Cain For Mailonline
title: Heidi Montag heads to pool in bikini in her London hotel | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 421 shares She tilted her head back and let her damp blonde locks fall towards the floor, before making her way to the pool steps. Heidi lowered herself carefully into the water, her pert posterior visible for a brief moment before becoming submerged in the water. Busty: She stripped down to a white and pink bikini and showed off her ample assets and tiny waist as she paraded around the pool room, which she had all to herself Work it: The Hills star reclined by the water's edge and elongated her body, displaying it to its full potential Laidback: She tilted her head back and let her damp blonde locks fall towards the floor, before making her way to the pool steps One step at a time: Heidi left her towel on the floor and slowly entered the water Natural: The reality star wore minimal makeup for her venture into the pool Going for a dip: Heidi's pert posterior visible for a brief moment before becoming submerged in the water In the deep end: Once in the pool she wet her hair and wrung out excess moisture Swimfan: She went for a brief swim, seemingly enjoying her alone time and a rare moment away from her husband's side Once in the pool, she wet her hair and wrung out excess moisture. She went for a brief swim, seemingly enjoying her alone time and a rare moment away from her husband's side. When she'd had enough, she climbed out and wrapped a white beach towel around her taut middle. The recent CBB stint certainly didn't seemed to have reaked havok with her waistline, unlike husband Spencer who has complained about gaining weight. Gained weight: On his way back to LA, husband Spencer Pratt complained about gaining 20lbs On his return to Los Angeles on Monday, the reality TV star lamented: 'Taking 20lbs of fat back home with me' Heidi recently featured in a Snapchat video recorded by her CBB co-star Jamie O'Hara in which she worked the pole in a strip club managed by Bianca Gascoigne. Displaying her raunchy side once again, Heidi was filmed playfully spanking Ola Jordan as the former Strictly star twerked in front of her while on a night out at The Libertine club days later. Cheeky! The blonde beauty's derriere was on show as she rested on the steps Wet wet wet: Heidi pulled herself out of the water and carefully adjusted her bottoms In shape: As she reclined her taut tum and impressive core strength came into play Contemplative: Heidi gazed into the distance while dipping her feet in the water The evening had started out ever so civilised as Ola and James Jordan were joined by Speidi, and Spencer's sister Stephanie, for a meal at Bocca Di Lupo restaurant. As prolific social media users James and Spencer's Twitter and Snapchat accounts demonstrated, they were all on fine form after a few glasses of wine. The pair's tweets became increasingly incoherent as the night went on, with The Hills star posting, 'I'm drunk', and 'Just trying not to puke'. Ballroom pro James retweeted a host of messages from fans about their wild antics, seemingly approving of the suggestion the straight-talking duo get their own show. A bit of all white: When she'd had enough, she climbed out and wrapped a white beach towel around her waist
